user.title: Set up WaterLevel.ie Integration
user.description:
Configure how often to fetch water level data from WaterLevel.ie (OPW Ireland).

The WaterLevel.ie API updates every 15 minutes, so update intervals less than 15 minutes are not recommended.

data_description.update_interval: How often to check for new data (15 minutes to 24 hours). Recommended: 15-30 minutes.

init.title: Configure WaterLevel.ie Options
init.description:
Adjust how often the integration fetches data from WaterLevel.ie.

**Current setting:** {current_interval} minutes
**API update frequency:** Every {api_update_frequency} minutes
**Allowed range:** {min_interval} to {max_interval} minutes

Lower intervals provide more frequent updates but use more resources. Since the API only updates every 15 minutes, intervals less than 15 minutes will not provide newer data.

data_description.update_interval: Enter a value between 15 minutes (most frequent) and 1440 minutes (once daily). Recommended: 15-30 minutes for active monitoring, 60-120 minutes for casual use.
